page.title: 13Penmount Crematorium
page.content:
{Penmount Crematorium,}controlled by a joint Committee representing the four District Councils of{Carrick, Kerrier, {Penwith}and{Restormel,}is the only Crematorium in Cornwall.
It is situated 2 miles from the city centre on a secluded country estate of 26 acres, part of which has been developed as{Gardens of Remembrance.
In 1956 there were{500}cremations carried out but during last year there were over{2600.
The crematorium serves most of Cornwall, the nearest one being in Plymouth.{50%}of corpses in Cornwall are cremated, compared with{66%}in the rest of Britain.
